TEXT.S: Maurice Ager2 bulad 9 demiad, 1984 a mihca, Maurice Ager, miunduay. Maurice Ager nalecuhan i Detroit, Michigan. Maurice Ager unu syubay kanas-mali miunduay nu Amilika NBA nisakaput, u tabakiay ayaway mimaliay, u misimaw zikuzay mimaliay. Maurice Ager i 2006 a mihcan NBA sapapili' mimaliay a kawaw, saka 1 ku uwac atu silsil 28, namapili' tu nu Dallas Mavericks putiput.
